# dnacenter_sites_count (Data Source)

It performs read operation on Site Design.

- Get sites count.

## Example Usage

```terraform

  provider = dnacenter
  name     = "string"
}

output "dnacenter_sites_count_example" {
  value = data.dnacenter_sites_count.example.items
}
```
